thread.section_title: Hotel Diocleziano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel with great service
thread.title_full: Nice hotel with great service - Review of Hotel Diocleziano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: SudeepDave
title: Nice hotel with great service
text: We loved our stay at Hotel Diocleziano. This hotel is situated very close to Roma Termini (approx 10 min walk). You can find lot of good restaurants and mini markets in close vicinity. Best hotel if someone is travelling to or from Roma Termini. The breakfast was good and staff was very helpful and courteous. The room was very clean and it got everything we needed to make our stay comfortable. Thank you everyone at Hotel Diocleziano to make our stay memorable.
